summary: Completed testing of India localization changes for CredMax fintech application. Backend APIs fully functional with Indian context. Fixed critical frontend compilation errors. Browser automation issues prevented complete UI testing.

compilation_issues_fixed.issue: RupeeSign import not found in lucide-react library
Template literal syntax errors using ₹{ instead of ${
compilation_issues_fixed.fix_applied: Fixed template literal syntax across all affected files

passed_tests: Credit card creation with Indian bank (HDFC Regalia)
Card management (get all cards, get by ID)
AI recommendations with Indian categories (Food & Dining, Fuel, Bills & Utilities, Online Shopping)
AI recommendations include Indian context in responses
Frontend compilation after fixing critical errors
action_item_for_main_agent: Browser automation environment has issues preventing complete UI testing. Recommend manual verification of frontend India localization features: 1) 'Built for India' tagline on landing page, 2) ₹ symbol display across pages, 3) Indian bank/card examples in forms, 4) Indian merchant placeholders, 5) Indian categories in dropdowns. All backend India localization features are working correctly.

success_percentage.frontend: 75% (compilation fixed, serving correctly, but UI testing incomplete due to browser issues)
